title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: this board no turn on, also doesn't turn fans,  can you help me with the initial measures for this type of board

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
USB-C input voltage?
PPBUS_G3H, 3V3_G3H?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
PPBUS_G3H=12.8v
3V3_G3H=0v

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Check diode mode to ground at L6995.
Post D6905 voltages.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
L6995=mode diode=0.0
D6905
PPDCIN_G3H_CHGR_R=5.1
PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H=4.9
PPBUS_G3H_R=0V

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
So you have short to ground at L6995?
Remove R6999 and check where the short remains.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: short to ground PP3V3_G3H(pin 2 resistor R6999),inject voltage and disappear short, Now I have 3.3v l6995 but it still doesn't turn on the computer

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: Which voltage did you inject?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: 2v

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Inspect under microscope all caps connected to 3V3_G3H.
If the short disappeared, shouldn't be an integrated circuit.

What is actual PPBUS_G3H voltage?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
I did not find a caps faill to 3V3_G3H
3V3_G3H=3.3V
PPBUS_G3H=0V Mode diode 0.44

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Post basic voltages for U7000; P_IN, AUX_DET, VDDA/P, SMC_RST*, AUX_OK, A/BMON.
Also check BUF_SMC_RESET_L.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
P_IN=5.1v after seconds=P_IN=20.3V
 AUX_DET=5v
VDDP=5V
VDDA=5.1
SMC_RST*=3.4V
AUX_OK=3.3V
AMON=0V
BMON=0V
BUF_SMC_RESET_L=3.3V

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: Remove F7000 and check C7050 voltage.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: ok voltage is 0v in C7050 ( remove f7000)

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Seems that no communication between SMC and U7000.
You can try changing U7000.
If the previous short on 3V3_G3H was caused by SMC, is another explanation.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: how do you know that there is no communication between u7000 and smc?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
That is another option, I said.
You can try changing U7000 first.
Also check all components, solders and traces around it.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: A question about this type of board that are thinner at what temperature and air in the station do you remove the chips?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: You should practice with scrap boards...

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: I already changed u7000 and the problem persists

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: I already changed u7000 problem persists

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: If all related resistors are good, then probably bad SMC.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: which resistors?

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Resistors around U7000.

Also check voltage and signals for U5000 (SYM 2 OF 2), at page 39.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message: Where can I get smc, it has to be from another board the same, don't they sell it by itself? any story? I tested this board with a damaged battery and from there it did not turn on again.

title: 820-00840-A not turn on
message:
Must get SMC from donor board.
New SMC doesn't have the proper frimware loaded...
